item.description:
The Artist is not playing this weekend at the Coolidge.  I've had to move this to the Kendall.  We'll be seeing the 4:30 show. 

 

After, we'll go someplace fun for a meal and a good Meetup talk.  I'll decide where once I know how many people are showing up so please update your RSVP.  There's no limit on the number of people who can attend.  We'll just divide up into separate tables of about 6-8.  But please, if you RSVP yes, plan on attending; and let me know if something comes up.

 

Here's a bit about the movie: 

Hollywood, 1927: As silent movie star George Valentin wonders if the arrival of talking pictures will cause him to fade into oblivion, he sparks with Peppy Miller, a young dancer set for a big break.
item.how_to_find_us: Before and after the movie, I will be waiting by the ticket taker.
item.name: The Artist
